FuncDef: This command creates a BIER sub-domain or range of sub-domains. For example, for IS-IS each sub-domain is associated with a single IS-IS topology, which may be any of the topologies supported by IS-IS.
CLIs: [ no ] sub-domain start sub-domain end sub-domain

ParaDef.Info: The ID of the sub-domain to be created or removed. Values-0 to 255.
